text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the day after the Tracen Meet.<n>For the first time ever,
Vodka doesn't<n>show up for training.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oh hey, you're Vodka's trainer, right?<n>Don't tell me... has
she not shown<n>up?
choice_data_list: Do you know where she might be?
Do you know where she might be?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, she's probably at the<n>riverbank. Ever since she read
this<n>one manga, she's all, "if I'm gonna<n>be brooding, it
has to be by a<n>riverbank."

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: She always talks about how cool it<n>is... Heh, what a dummy.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I might have my complaints about her,<n>but I'm not my best
self when she's<n>not around... So please, bring her<n>back.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: After thanking Daiwa Scarlet, I hurry<n>to the riverbank.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh... 'Sup, Trainer.
choice_data_list: It's time for training, you know?
It's time for training, you know?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Ugh, I know that already. I'm skipping<n>today—no buts!
choice_data_list: Didn't you say skipping practice was lame?
Didn't you say skipping practice was lame?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Ughhh, shut up already! Get lost—just<n>leave me alone!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Leave someone as... lame as me<n>alone!
choice_data_list: Why do you think you're lame?
Why do you think you're lame?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I thought I had it in me. I was really<n>goin' all out—I was
gonna be the rising<n>star that took down Narita Brian!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But... when we started actually<n>running, I could feel the huge
gap<n>between us. I felt like I was gonna<n>pass out halfway
through!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I thought to myself, "I can't do it."

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But those racers I grew up watching...<n>the ones in the
Derby—not a single one<n>of them ever gave up!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Trainer... am I just no good?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
If this is how I am pre-debut, then<n>how am I ever gonna be
cool?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's obvious that Vodka is losing her<n>confidence. How can I
cheer her up?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I might have my complaints about her,<n>but I'm not my best
self when she's<n>not around... So please, bring her<n>back.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Come to think of it, why did Daiwa<n>Scarlet say that to me?
Maybe she<n>wanted to tell Vodka something...
choice_data_list: Let's head back to the track for now, Vodka.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? No, like I said—

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey! Stop pushin' me! What're you<n>doin'?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huff... Ah, it's Vodka.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ...Scarlet.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Why are you here? You told me you<n>wanted to take a break
after the Meet.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hmph. I changed my schedule. You<n>have a problem with
that?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
It's all because some dummy<n>decided to go up against the
big<n>leagues... Yet despite her opponent's<n>breakneck pace,
she kept up just fine.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
And she even accelerated during the<n>straightaways... Made
me think, "I<n>can't let myself be left behind."

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Scarlet, you...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Anyway, I need to get back to training<n>now.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
The hell is she talkin' about? Lookin'<n>up to me like that...
Meanwhile, I... I'm<n>here being super lame!
choice_data_list:
It doesn't change the fact that you tried. That's
already cool.

It doesn't change the fact that you tried. That's
already cool.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Yeah... but I gave up in the middle!
choice_data_list:
We can't change the past. What we can do,
though, is focus on the future.

We can't change the past. What we can do,
though, is focus on the future.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: The future?
choice_data_list:
It's up to you whether you wanna stay lame like
this, or overcome it.

It's up to you whether you wanna stay lame like
this, or overcome it.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Up... to me... I... I...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Trainer! I got a favor to ask!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Please... help me redeem myself!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Since then, Vodka has had a<n>resurgence of focus and
motivation.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: There you are, Scarlet! C'mon, let's<n>race!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh? I can't, I already have plans—

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Don't sweat the small stuff! C'mon,<n>it's just one lap! You
ready? Here we<n>go!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Wait! Get back here!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Several days later...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Lookin' forward to it, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph. Bring it on. I'll make you<n>regret it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Vodka has decided to challenge Narita<n>Brian to a one-on-one
rematch!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Uuurgh!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(Holy craaaap! She's fast! How the<n>hell am I supposed to
catch up?)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (But I...)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Arghhh!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (I won't give up! Not ever again!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (I'll do whatever it takes to be cool!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Yaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: In the end, Narita Brian wins the race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite the overwhelming difference<n>in skill, Vodka musters
every ounce of<n>her strength to chase after the<n>formidable
"beast."

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Not bad. Let's do this again.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh! Th-thank you so much, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Trainer... Hehe, thank you!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna be even cooler from now<n>on, so watch
carefully—'cause ya<n>won't wanna miss it!
